name: int_fiction
description: Interactive fictin a la Land of Lisp

scripts.comment: Ref: https://www.keithcirkel.co.uk/how-to-use-npm-as-a-build-tool/;echo npm run   => list npm commands
scripts.plato: plato -r -d plato-reports -x 'node_modules|plato-reports|coverage' .; echo Plato reports at: file:///home/cecilm/play/NodeJS/int-fiction/plato-reports/index.html
scripts.wc: wc *.js lib/*.js test/*.js package.json README.md backup.sh
scripts.coverage: istanbul cover _mocha -- --ui bdd -R spec -t 5000 --compilers js:babel-register world.js inlineTest.js test/world-test.js ; echo Report at: $(pwd)/coverage/lcov-report/index.html
